name: Mell Chrismas
description:
Mell Chrismas (name written in broken spelling in purpose) is a game driven by a young girl, Mell, and the people around her. It's Christmas, and a teddy bear is delivered to Mell. Puzzled by where it came from, since Mell doesn't have any real family, she decides to find out who gave her the gift, and reveals more than that...

 Gameplay about 40 mins to 1 hrs long, free to make let's play videos.

 The game is not a horror game, despite it's black and white graphics.

Game by Ssang Ssang Byar (@DoublSB)

Translated by KyleHeren (@KyleHeren)

Original Korean download link can be found here : http://doublsb.tistory.com/14

After downloading the files, BE SURE TO SAVE THE FONT (Typo_PapyrusB.ttf) IN YOUR FONT FOLDER! THE TEXT WILL NOT SHOW CORRECTLY IF YOU DISREGARD THIS!
